casebody.data:
HSBC BANK USA, N.A., Respondent,
v.
Christopher N. CROSSLAND, etc., Appellant, et al., Defendants. 2018-175 Court of Appeals of New York. March 29, 2018

Motion for reargument of motion for leave to appeal denied [see 30 N.Y.3d 1047, 69 N.Y.S.3d 575, 92 N.E.3d 798 (2018) ]. Motion for poor person relief dismissed as academic. Motion for a stay dismissed as academic.
